Body.\u00a0:
IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 1.5m for 30 mins)
MIL-STD-810G compliant*

Memory.Card slot: microSDXC (dedicated slot) - single-SIM modelmicroSDXC (uses shared SIM slot) - dual-SIM model

12 MP, f/1.8, 27mm (wide), 1.4µm, PDAF, OIS

TOF 3D, f/1.4, (depth sensor)

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA
